message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $150. I think you'll find it's a steal at this rate!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 is my initial offer, I'm willing to come down to $130. This product is truly top-notch and worth every penny!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $110. Can you consider that?
